Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor and the Undersea Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces The Human Meteor and his initial investigations into a suspicious underwater activity, leading him to uncover a Japanese submarine torpedo plot.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic, main character, and initial underwater setting.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi and the G-Men Chase
sub_scenes.description: Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront and his subsequent transformation to pursue a suspicious car.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts suspects, recovers, and then plans to infiltrate the yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Trap and Submarine Plot Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Events on the yacht, Duke's realization of a setup, and the reveal of Toby's true role and the submarine plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap
Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Reconnaissance and Torpedo Plot
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor's underwater investigation and discovery of the sunken submarine and the torpedo plot.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Battle and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor's confrontation with divers and his subsequent attack on the enemy ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation
Discovery of Peter's Condition on Ship
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Duke's boat chase, yacht confrontation, investigation, and the revelation of Peter's treachery.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer
Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads and their fight against Nazi spies, interwoven with a contemporary story of boys uncovering a sabotage plot.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis, followed by a shift to a contemporary scene with an ambulance arriving.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis

sub_scenes.title: The Bus Garage Mystery and Abduction
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a wallet, investigate a bus garage address, and are abducted by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Fight and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Fight at the bus garage, accusations, and the boys' escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Marine Intervention and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marine response, office fight, and the resolution of the Nazi spy ring plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces The Champ and Henry in South America, investigating Nazi intrigue and the kidnapping of the President's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Champ and Henry and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Champ and Henry and the shift to a South American setting where soldiers are searching for Americans.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Military Interrogation and Escape to Consul
sub_scenes.description: Military apprehension and interrogation of civilians, followed by Champ and Henry escaping and deciding to seek help from the American Consul.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Kidnapping and Hideout Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre forces men into a car, takes them to a house, and sets up the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order
Preparation for Action on Tamale Street
Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars

sub_scenes.title: Garbage Bin Interrogation and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation and interrogation involving a garbage bin, leading to the discovery of Rosita's imprisonment and a rescue plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Horseback pursuit, infiltration, rescue of Rosita, and the defeat of Nazi spies.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy
Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, dealing with disobedience, capture, and a complex situation involving native tribes and foreign agents.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting Disobedience
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan's jungle combat, followed by reporting to a superior officer and confessing disobedience.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival, Ambush, and Plan Acquisition
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's arrival in the jungle, exploration, ambush by natives, and forced plan acquisition.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition

sub_scenes.title: Marine Attack, Fire, and Dolan's Capture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's arson, marine attack, Dolan's escape attempt, and his capture, along with Sam's fate.

narrative_arcs.title: Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Jungle Fight and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's jungle entrance, fight with natives, the Chief's death, and the subsequent alliance with the native tribe.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance

sub_scenes.title: Ship Dilemma, Attack on Sam, and Dolan's Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Captain's dilemma on ship, attack on Sam, officers fighting back, and Dolan receiving discipline.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a complex plot involving racketeers and blood transfusions.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and Newspaper Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their briefing at the newspaper office about the Burgess murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story
Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Investigation at the police station reveals Reilly is in the hospital, leading to a hospital visit and discovery of Reilly's illness.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci Blood Revelation and Candy Store Call
sub_scenes.description: Revelation about Farnacci's blood being needed, leading to a phone call from a candy store to Elijah for research.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and Mrs. Murphy's crucial revelation about Reilly's sacrifice.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Reilly's Escape, Chase, and Gangster Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Reilly's coal chute escape, Diane's taxi pursuit blocked by a neighborhood crowd, and Reilly's confrontation with gangsters.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Emergency and Blood Transfusion
sub_scenes.description: Ambulance arrival, transport to hospital, blood transfusion efforts, and Reilly's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Birthday Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Decision to arrest Farnacci, police raid, and the final resolution with Farnacci's imprisonment and a birthday celebration.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest
